Sambangi Kejagung, Kapolri Bahas Penguatan Penegakan Hukum
04 Nov 2019, 22:58 by Agus Wijananto


Sambangi Kejagung, Kapolri Bahas Penguatan Penegakan Hukum

KBRN, Jakarta : Setelah dilantik, Kapolri Jenderal Pol. Idham Azis masih terus melanjutkan silaturahmi ke antar-lembaga negara. Setelah bertemu Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto dan pimpinan Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK), kali ini, kunjungan selanjutnya ke Kejaksaan Agung (Kejagung).Kepala Biro Penerangan Masyarakat (Karo Penmas) Divisi Humas Polri Brigjen Dedi Prasetyo menjelaskan, selain silaturahmi, kedatangan Kapolri ke Kejagung untuk memperkuat penegakan hukum antara Korps Bhayangkara dan Korps Adhyaksa."Kejagung merupakan mitra stategis Polri dalam criminal justice system (CJS). Sehingga, diperlukan peningkatan sinergitas dalam penegakkan hukum antara Polri dan Kejaksaan Agung," kata Dedi saat dikonfirmasi di Mabes Polri, Senin (4/11/2019).Sebagai mitra kerja, menurut Dedi, Kapolri Idham Azis memandang perlu adanya pertemuan dengan Jaksa Agung ST. Burhanuddin dan jajarannya. Mengingat, selama ini kerjasama penegakan hukum Polri dan Kejagung sudah berjalan dengan baik."Penguatan kerjasama CJS selama ini sudah berjalan dengan baik. Beberapa di antaranya adalah penanganan kasus-kasus terorisme, cyber crime, narkoba, Karhutla, Gakumdu dan kasus pidana lainnya," ujar Dedi.Dedi memastikan, dalam rangka meningkatkan sinergitas dalam penegakan hukum ke depan, Polri dan Kejagung akan terus ditingkatkan mulai dari tingkat Kejaksaan Negeri, Kejaksaan Tinggi dan Kejagung. "Guna mendukung program pembangunan dan kebijakan pemerintah di segala bidang," ucap Dedi.Program kebijakan pemerintah yang dimaksud, dijelaskan Dedi, salah satunya adalah menguatkan peran tim Saber Pungli dan mengawal dana desa agar tepat sasaran. "Penguatan kerja dalam rangka pencegahan korupsi melalui tim Saber Pungli dan penggunaan dana desa untuk pembangunan sesuai instruksi Presiden Jokowi," ujar Dedi.Seusai dilantik menjadi Kapolri, Jenderal Idham Azis memang terus melakukan silaturahmi ke antar-lembaga negara. Silaturahmi merupakan komitmen dari Kapolri untuk mewujudkan program unggulannya yang salah satunya adalah menguatkan kerjasama dan sinergitas terhadap lembaga penegak hukum di Indonesia.

Visiting the Attorney General's Office, the National Police Chief Discussed Strengthening Law Enforcement
Nov 04 2019, 22:58 by Agus Wijananto


Visiting the Attorney General's Office, the National Police Chief Discussed Strengthening Law Enforcement

KBRN, Jakarta: After being installed, National Police Chief General Pol. Idham Azis still continued the relationship between state institutions. After meeting with the TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto and the head of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK), this time, the next visit to the Attorney General's Office (AGO). AGO to strengthen law enforcement between the Bhayangkara Corps and the Adhyaksa Corps. "The AGO is a strategic partner of the National Police in the criminal justice system (CJS). Therefore, it is necessary to increase synergy in law enforcement between the National Police and the Attorney General's Office," Dedi said when confirmed at the National Police Headquarters on Monday. (4/11/2019). As a working partner, according to Dedi, National Police Chief Idham Azis considers it necessary to have a meeting with the Attorney General ST. Burhanuddin and his staff. "The strengthening of CJS cooperation has been going well so far. Some of them are handling cases of terrorism, cyber crime, drugs, forest and land law, Gakumdu and other criminal cases," he said. said Dedi. Dedi ensured that in the context of increasing synergy in law enforcement in the future, the National Police and Attorney General's Office would continue to be improved starting from the level of the District Attorney's Office, the High Prosecutor's Office and the Attorney General's Office. "To support development programs and government policies in all fields," said Dedi. The intended government policy program, explained Dedi, was one of which was to strengthen the role of the Saber Pungli team and oversee village funds so that they were right on target. "Strengthening work in order to prevent corruption through the Saber Pungli team and the use of village funds for development according to President Jokowi's instructions," Dedi said. The hospitality was a commitment from the National Police Chief to realize its superior program, one of which was to strengthen cooperation and synergy with law enforcement agencies in Indonesia.
